      • invoke

        public java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.String request,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metaInfo)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceHandler
        Performs the actions associated with the request and returns a response, which currently must be a String. Could be used to configure a threadpool to handle the actual work.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface ServiceHandler
        Parameters:
        request - the content of the request
        metaInfo - name/value pairs including protocol info such as request headers
        Returns:
        the response (currently must be a String or implement toString())
